snippet: former Chicago alderman and Cook County commissioner, Robert Shaw, announced Thursday that he would run against Rahm Emanuel for Chicago mayor next year.
abstract: Former Chicago alderman and Cook County commissioner Robert Shaw announces he will challenge fellow Democrat Rahm Emanuel for Chicago mayor in 2015.
lead_paragraph: former Chicago alderman and Cook County commissioner, Robert Shaw, announced Thursday that he would run against Rahm Emanuel for Chicago mayor next year.

headline.main: Illinois: Ex-Alderman to Run for Mayor of Chicago
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Ex-Alderman to Run for Mayor of Chicago
